title: Gearty Grilling: Julian Le Grand on how choice and competition improves public services
itunes:author: Julian Le Grand
description: Contributor(s): Julian Le Grand | Julian Le Grand, Richard Titmuss professor of social policy and one of the principal architects of the UK Government’s public service reforms, explains why competition is the best way of enhancing hospitals and schools.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Julian Le Grand | Julian Le Grand, Richard Titmuss professor of social policy and one of the principal architects of the UK Government’s public service reforms, explains why competition is the best way of enhancing hospitals and schools.
